name: Dome Lime Wall Picture 30cm or 50cm sq
description: 'Dome in Amber' A piece of bespoke modern art, a vibrant infusion of colour and something just that little bit different... This beautifully designed fused glass wall art picture is set on a 6mm polished-edged clear glass base, making a sophisticated and stunning addition to any space. Made using the finest coloured fusible glass available, it is an original hand-crafted work of art, signed by the artist, Jennifer Barker. This Dome in Lime design is available in two sizes, 30cm sq (coloured glass 17cm) and 50cm sq (coloured glass 28cm), and comes with a concealed hanging bracket and distancers that allow the glass to 'float' on the wall surface.

name: Love Grows Blue Colour Bar
description: 'Love Grows Blue' This may be our smallest product, but it's big on colour and energy. A beautiful fused glass wall hanging will add a splash of colour to any space. Hang it in a window and watch the colours come alive with sunlight, or enhance a small space that was once plain and dull with the radiant quality of this contemporary and original fused glass work of art. A fabulous gift or perhaps a treat for oneself... This Love Grows Blue design measures approx 40cm x 7cm and comes finished with a 2mm leather hanging cord

This Singing Sea Turquoise design is available in two sizes, 30cm sq (coloured glass 17cm) and 50cm sq (coloured glass 28cm), and comes with a concealed hanging bracket and distancers that allow the glass to 'float' on the wall surface.
